Text: Hey....the least you can do is seed long enough so others can download the entire flick and then seed for the rest of us.....since you're too lazy to seed your own shit!

Without enough seeders, no one will download to see if its worth it. Frankly, I would love to have 3D copies of the original trilogy, but Lucas  demanded my first born, and I couldn't get him or the Mrs. to balk.....
